author: Nerd of the Rings
description:
The one ring answers to Sauron alone...or does it?  It's one of the most common misconceptions I see in my comments section - the idea that anyone but Sauron using the ring was out of the question.  However, as Tolkien himself says in his letters - it was possible for others to use, and even master the One Ring!

Hit subscribe and the bell for great Tolkien content every week!

title: Who COULD Wield The One Ring? | Tolkien Explained
